All Implemented Interfaces:

public class ECDiffieHellmanCng
extends ECDiffieHellman
The base .NET class managing System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng, System.Security.Cryptography.Cng, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a. Extends NetObject.

See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng
